{"id":988994463,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1688786756,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/988994463/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"43.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        int n = s.length();\n        \n        int max = 0;\n\n        Set<Character> set = new HashSet<>();\n        int j = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n            // checking for if the character is already present in answer or not\n            if(set.contains(ch)) {\n                // remove the duplicate one, using j pointer\n                while(s.charAt(j) != ch && j <= i) {\n                    if(set.contains(s.charAt(j))) set.remove(s.charAt(j));\n                    j++;\n                }\n                // not removing the character from set just increament j\n                j++;\n            } else {\n                set.add(ch);\n            }\n\n            max = Math.max(max, i - j + 1);\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
